name: CyberNix7702
description:
Hellllloooo NixCity !!!

Arasako the cassoulax master chief want some tomatoes and you are on his path !

Will you survive the hords of master Cassoulax ?

Only one way to know... Click that damn play button !

The game is also available on the web here :

https://cybernix7702.z28.web.core.windows.net/

We decided to put it there because we were not sure that the score board would work (CORS blabla...)
